0.name: Pyrograph Arcanum
0.fullDesc:
Sets the number of "Ashen Roast" stacks on enemy targets to the highest number of "Ashen Roast" stacks present on the battlefield. Then, activates a Zone and deals Fire DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of Jiaoqiu's ATK to all enemies.
While inside the Zone, enemy targets receive {{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}% increased Ultimate DMG, with a {{2, percent}}% base chance of being inflicted with 1 stack of Ashen Roast when taking action. While the Zone exists, this effect can trigger up to {{5}} time(s). And for each enemy target, it can only trigger once per turn. This trigger count resets every time Jiaoqiu uses Ultimate.
The Zone lasts for {{4}} turn(s), and its duration decreases by 1 at the start of this unit's every turn. If Jiaoqiu gets knocked down, the Zone will also be dispelled.
0.shortDesc: Sets the number of "Ashen Roast" stacks on enemy targets to the highest number of "Ashen Roast" stacks present on the battlefield. Then, activates a Zone and deals Fire DMG to all enemies. While inside the Zone, enemy targets <orangeStrong>receive increased Ultimate DMG</orangeStrong>, with a chance of being inflicted with 1 stack of Ashen Roast when taking action.

0.name: Quartet Finesse, Octave Finery
0.fullDesc:
When Jiaoqiu hits an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill or Ultimate, there is a {{1, percent}}% base chance to inflict 1 stack of Ashen Roast on them. At 1 stack, increases DMG received by the enemy by {{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%. Then, each subsequent stack increases this by {{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%.
Ashen Roast is capped at {{4}} stack(s) and lasts for {{5}} turn(s).
When an enemy target is afflicted with Ashen Roast, they are also considered as being Burned at the same time, taking Fire DoT equal to {{6, percent}}% of Jiaoqiu's ATK at the start of each turn.
0.shortDesc: When attacking with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, there is a high chance to inflict 1 stack of "Ashen Roast" on the target, causing the enemy to take increased DMG and also be considered as Burned at the same time.
